Class Ellipse

java.lang.Object
com.codeforall.simplegraphics.graphics.Ellipse
All Implemented Interfaces:
Colorable, Fillable, Movable, Shape
public class Ellipse extends Object implements Shape, Colorable, Fillable, Movable
Represents an ellipse shape that can be drawn, filled, moved, and resized. The ellipse is defined by its bounding box, which determines its x/y position, width, and height. This class integrates with the Canvas to visually render itself. Implements:
  • Shape – for rendering and bounding box info
  • Colorable – for setting its color
  • Fillable – for supporting fill operations
  • Movable – for translation and scaling
